name: unchristened
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Someone who is unchristened has not officially been made a member of the Christian Church in a service of baptism (= a ceremony in which water is put on someone's head or they are put under water for a short time): Paying his initial visits around the parish, he found a couple with an unchristened child.
not yet formally given a name: The baby rhino, as yet unchristened, was born at the zoo a week ago.
More examplesFewer examplesWhile the rest of the class said their prayers, I was sent out of the room for being unchristened.The baby lived only a short time after birth and died unchristened.It was the code name given to the unchristened software by developers.
